entrance.name: Collapsed Entrance
entrance.desc_full: The cold air presses against my skin like a warning. Dust moves even when I stand still. Long cracks run along the walls, and the silence seems staged. But I'm alone here, right..? The dark tunnel stretches north, seemingly pulling me...
entrance.desc_short: Cold air. Dust moves even when you stand still.

tunnel1.name: Long Tunnel
tunnel1.desc_full: The tunnel stretches forward. Metallic echoes bounce between the walls, returning a heartbeat slower than they should... like they're hesitating. Water drips from rusted pipes overhead, but every now and then another sound slips between the drops: a breath pulled too sharply, a faint scrape of metal. The air grows colder the deeper you look.
tunnel1.desc_short: Echoes come late. Water drips, but as if something else listens.

junction1.name: Track Junction
junction1.desc_full: Three paths divide here. The ground has marks as if something has been dragged here, fresh enough that dust hasn't settled into them yet. The air carries a faint smell of old metal. The western tunnel is darker than night. The eastern door has a 'Service' sign above. For a moment, the stillness feels poised, as if the whole junction expects you to follow the wrong path.
junction1.desc_short: Three paths. Dust disturbed by recent movement.

dark_tunnel.name: Pitch Black Tunnel
dark_tunnel.desc_full: Light pushes against the darkness here but barely holds. The walls emerge one section at a time: smeared stains, scratches, and long, dragging marks that cut across the floor. The air is tight and stale, clinging to your throat. Every sound you make feels muffled, as if the tunnel is swallowing your presence. You get the constant impression that something stands just outside the reach of your light, waiting for the moment you turn it away.
dark_tunnel.desc_short: Scratches. Drag marks. Darkness clings to you.
dark_tunnel.desc_dark: **I can't see anything...** In complete darkness, the air seems to stand still. Rustling sounds nearby are too steady, as if someone isn't breathing, but listening.

chamber_room.name: Chamber
chamber_room.desc_full: Circular room. Marks on the floor look recent. The sound of my breath seems to drift upward, as if the room's dome is higher than it should be.
chamber_room.desc_dark: **I can't see anything. It's too dark.** The darkness here is thicker than the air.

storage_dark.name: Maintenance Storage
storage_dark.desc_full: The cramped room smells of rust, dust, and cold metal. Shelves bow under the weight of old tools, but many pieces aren't where they should be: a wrench lies on the floor, a screwdriver sits balanced on the edge of a table, a box is cracked open like someone searched through it in a hurry. Dust on the ground shows a single set of footprints that don't belong to you. The metallic scent grows stronger the longer I remain here.
storage_dark.desc_short: Old tools scattered. Footprints you didn't leave.

service_room1.name: Service Room
service_room1.desc_full: Broken lockers gape open. Papers lie torn on the ground. A smashed radio sits in a corner, its speaker buzzing with faint static that rises and falls in uneven pulses. The feeling of intrusion hangs heavy here. A faint impression in the dust near the wall looks like the imprint of a knee, as if someone crouched there, listening.
service_room1.desc_short: Broken lockers. Radio breathes static on its own.

station_a.name: Abandoned Station A
station_a.desc_full: Flickering lights. Every second or two the world freezes in darkness before a dim bulb ignites again. Tiles crack under your feet, echoing down the empty station far longer than they should. Sometimes you hear a second echo overlapping yours... slower. Eastern corridor is blocked by a door with an electronic lock.
station_a.desc_short: Flickering lights. Tiles crack under your feet

station_corridor.name: Station Corridor
station_corridor.desc_full: The corridor stretches ahead, lined with posters where the faces have been ripped off. Deep scratches run across the walls, not random but almost directional, pointing north. A faint trail of cold air moves through the corridor, too steady to be natural, and each time it brushes your neck, it feels like fingers.

locker_room.name: Locker Room
locker_room.desc_full: Rusty lockers tower above you, their doors hanging loose. Some lockers are slightly open, revealing glimpses of nothing... A few items lie on the benches as if someone set them down and simply… never picked them up.
locker_room.desc_short: Rusty lockers tower above you, their doors hanging loose.

station_b.name: Station B
station_b.desc_full: A wide platform opens into eerie stillness. The broken train rests on the tracks like it has been there forever, its windows reflecting nothing. The metal hull creaks occasionally, the kind of sound a cooling machine might make… except it's been dead for years. I don't even know if I should step in. A lonely corridor appears up on the eastern side as I come closer.
station_b.desc_short: Wide platform. A broken train rests silently.

train_car1.name: Train Car 1
train_car1.desc_full: Seats look surprisingly clean. The whole inside is alike. The darkness and dust became so familiar that cleaness feels disturbing. When you stand still, the metal beneath your feet hums faintly, as though the car remembers motion.
train_car1.desc_short: Seats look surprisingly clean. The whole inside is alike.

train_car2.name: Train Car 2
train_car2.desc_full: Cold air blows through the cracked window, carrying a faint metallic taste. Door on the eastern side is open. On the glass, the message “DON'T FOLLOW” is carved deeply, with lines jagged enough to suggest hurried, trembling hands. The scratches glisten slightly, as if freshly made. The entire car feels abandoned mid-moment. Almost welcoming.
train_car2.desc_short: Cold air. Scratches on a window: 'DON'T FOLLOW'. Door on the right is open

train_car3.name: Train Car 3
train_car3.desc_full: As you enter, a sharp breath echoes around you... too close, too real... then vanishes with unnatural precision. The air is warmer here. The seats are untouched, which somehow makes it worse. The walls are faintly fogged with condensation, yet you feel no humidity.
train_car3.desc_short: Warm air. Breathing stops when you enter.

dead_end.name: Dead end
dead_end.desc_full: Crawled out of the last train car to see nothing. The tunnel is collapsed and there's nowhere to go.
dead_end.desc_short: The tunnel is collapsed and there's nowhere to go.

operator_booth.name: Operator Booth
operator_booth.desc_full: A big amount of black screens. One is clearly torn out. A lot of paper notes around. The door to the room on the northern side is wide open.
operator_booth.desc_short: A big amount of black screens. One is clearly torn out. A lot of paper notes around. Door on the northern side wide open

archive_room.name: Archive
archive_room.desc_full: Stacks of old folders. Some are scattered across the floor.

maintenance_shaft.name: Maintenance Shaft
maintenance_shaft.desc_full: The shaft narrows around, metal walls close enough to brush your shoulders. Rust spreads in patterns that resemble veins, branching out like the place itself is corroding from within. Three rooms accessible from here. Every time you turn your back to the entrance, a sharp awareness crawls up your spine. The sense of eyes resting on you.
maintenance_shaft.desc_short: Tight shaft. Rust everywhere. Three rooms accessible from here.

ventilation_room.name: Ventilation room
ventilation_room.desc_full: Now I understand why it is so hard to breath. The ventilation systems don't work. It shouldn't surprise me anymore.

first_aid_room.name: First aid
first_aid_room.desc_full: Room looks like it was turned upside down. As if someone has searched for something here. What a mess.
first_aid_room.desc_short: Room looks like it was turned upside down. What a mess.
first_aid_room.desc_dark: **Can't see nothing here...** Something sticky under my feet. The smell is alarming.

generator_room.name: Generator Room
generator_room.desc_full: The generator stands like a beast, its metal frame exposed and wires hanging. Tools lie scattered around it, but not carelessly. Some bolts appear freshly loosened, dust wiped from specific parts of the engine.
generator_room.desc_short: The engine is dead. Tools scattered around.

power_control.name: Power Control Room
power_control.desc_full:
The panels blink weakly, their lights flickering in uneven patterns. Smudged fingerprints cover the surfaces, and some switches flipped. 
The air vibrates with the faint hum of electricity struggling to stay alive.
power_control.desc_short: Panels blinking faintly. Something was repaired recently.

side_tunnel.name: Side Tunnel
side_tunnel.desc_full: Another tunnel... Loose wires sway above you, though the air is perfectly still. The deeper you look, the more the sound shifts, moving position like it's circling you.
side_tunnel.desc_short: Loose wires. A long tunnel ahead...

old_platform.name: Old Platform
old_platform.desc_full: Old metro signs hang crooked, some with letters scraped off in long strokes. I think I heard some noises across the tracks. But now my path splits in three ways... again.
old_platform.desc_short: Dusty. Old metro signs. Three ways to go.

communication_room.name: Communication room
communication_room.desc_full: Light is flickering. A table with radio equipment stays in the middle. The battery cover is torn out.
communication_room.desc_short: Light is flickering. A table with radio equipment stays in the middle. The battery cover is torn out.

lift_shaft.name: Lift Shaft
lift_shaft.desc_full: An empty shaft. A broken cable hangs into the darkness. The darkness descends endlessly.

sealed_door.name: Sealed Door
sealed_door.desc_full: A massive sealed door blocks the path forward, its surface scarred with desperate scratches. The lock mechanism bears scuff marks, as though someone tried again and again to force their way through. When you place your hand on the metal, it feels faintly warm. A low vibration hums from deep behind it, steady and alive.
sealed_door.desc_short: Huge door. Scratched, warm, humming faintly.

escape_tunnel.name: Escape Tunnel
escape_tunnel.desc_full: Fresh air. The exit must be close.
